div.p: The following example illustrates accessing an inpatient encounter:

pre.code: define "Inpatient Encounter": [Encounter: "Encounter Inpatient"] EncounterInpatient where EncounterInpatient.status = 'finished' and "LengthInDays"(EncounterInpatient.period) <= 120 and EncounterInpatient.period ends during "Measurement Period"

tr.td: See the patterns page for implementation and usage patterns.
